title: Google\Cloud\DataLabeling\V1beta1\HumanAnnotationConfig
name: HumanAnnotationConfig
description:
Configuration for how human labeling task should be done.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datalabeling.v1beta1.HumanAnnotationConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.annotated_dataset_display_name
params.description: Required. A human-readable name for AnnotatedDataset defined by users. Maximum of 64 characters .

params.name: data.annotated_dataset_description
params.description: Optional. A human-readable description for AnnotatedDataset. The description can be up to 10000 characters long.

params.name: data.label_group
params.description: Optional. A human-readable label used to logically group labeling tasks. This string must match the regular expression [a-zA-Z\\d_-]{0,128}.

params.name: data.language_code
params.description: Optional. The Language of this question, as a BCP-47. Default value is en-US. Only need to set this when task is language related. For example, French text classification.

params.name: data.replica_count
params.description: Optional. Replication of questions. Each question will be sent to up to this number of contributors to label. Aggregated answers will be returned. Default is set to 1. For image related labeling, valid values are 1, 3, 5.

params.name: data.question_duration
params.description: Optional. Maximum duration for contributors to answer a question. Maximum is 3600 seconds. Default is 3600 seconds.

params.name: data.contributor_emails
params.description: Optional. If you want your own labeling contributors to manage and work on this labeling request, you can set these contributors here. We will give them access to the question types in crowdcompute. Note that these emails must be registered in crowdcompute worker UI: https://crowd-compute.appspot.com/

params.name: data.user_email_address
params.description: Email of the user who started the labeling task and should be notified by email. If empty no notification will be sent.
